description: This file defines a utility module for interacting with an offline storage system using localForage. It provides functions to set, get, list keys, iterate entries, remove items, and clear buckets in the 'learnbridge' offline storage.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Stores a value in a specified bucket and key.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a value from a specified bucket and key.

methods.name: keys
methods.description: Retrieves all keys within a specified bucket.

methods.name: entries
methods.description: Iterates over all items in a bucket and returns an array of key-value pairs.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes an item from a specified bucket and key.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items in a specified bucket.
